description: Details about the vehicle promotional offers.

Event Name.description: The name of the sales event, if one is present, such as Year End Winter Clearance.  If no specific event is named, this should be set to simply Automotive Sales.

Offer Description.description: In 10 words or less, a summary of the primary offer presented. For example: Purchase a vehicle with 0% APR for 60 months.

Vehicle Financing Type.description: If the piece includes financing options for either purchasing (Loan) a vehicle, leasing (Lease) a vehicle, or both (Lease,Loan).

Offer Loan Term.description: If there is a Loan or Lease offer on the vehicle, how many months?

Offer APR.description: The annual percentage rate (APR) for the loan, expressed as a percentage. Sometimes referenced as 0% Financing, or offer APR.(%). If there are multiple mentioned, include only the lowest.

Offer Expiration.description: When does the promotional offer expire.

Purchase Discount.description: The dollar amount discounted from the Manufacturer Suggested Retail Price (MSRP). May also be referred to as Bonus Cash or Discount.
